participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative, introspective, and a bit quirky. Enjoys deep conversations about art and music.
participant_1.background: I like to go for walks in the park, even though my feet smell. My favorite french fries are from McDonald's. I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk. I love lasagna like I am Garfield. My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Artistic, friendly, and health-conscious. Enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_2.background: I'd love to share a meal with someone who shares my passion for sketching. I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with. I wish I could say that I do, but my health is more important. I like to arm wrestle. I currently hold three jobs.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm excited to spend the day sketching.
Oh, that's cool! I enjoy sketching too. What do you like to sketch?
I like to sketch people, animals, and landscapes.
That's really cool! I love sketching landscapes. Do you have any favorite artists?
I love the work of Van Gogh and Monet. What about you?
I love Van Gogh too! My favorite artist is actually Salvador Dali.
Oh, I love his work too! He has such a unique style.
I know, right? I love his use of color and perspective.
Me too! Have you ever seen any of his work in person?
I have! I went to the Salvador Dali museum in St. Petersburg, Florida a few years ago.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to go to that museum.
It was amazing! I highly recommend it.
I will definitely have to check it out sometime.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about art
